title: WTB:N172 Al Mays and John Weyhing
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: WTB:N172 Al Mays and John Weyhing
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone.  I deleted my last post for old judges because it was far to broad.  I am just getting into collecting them and I want to start by trying to find a N172 Al Mays and John Weyhing.  If anyone has one of these two players please shoot me a scan and what you want for them to [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  

I think I am going to try to collect all the poses for John Weyhing eventually if I can.  As always thank you for all the help

Tony Turner
